meanings.definition: A person with a language disorder affecting comprehension or expression.
meanings.sent1: Dysphasics may find it hard to understand or speak clearly.
meanings.sent2: The dysphasics in the class receive special language therapy.
meanings.sent3: The dysphasics at the party had a fun time playing charades.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced around her like a puzzle, a challenge for dysphasics to solve.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used pictures to help the dysphasics learn new words.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of dysphasics.
meanings.sent1: The dysphasics support group provides a safe space for those with language challenges.
meanings.sent2: Her dysphasics-friendly approach to teaching helped many students improve.
meanings.sent3: The dysphasics-themed event was a hit with the community.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked in dysphasics ways, seeing language in a unique light.
meanings.sent5: The dysphasics-friendly website had clear, easy-to-understand instructions.
